content.title: Intro
content.content:
2019
Preceded by
2019
2020
Year
2021
Followed by
2021

Tolkien-related events that took place in 2020.

content.title: January
content.content:
3 - Birthday Toast.
16 - Christopher Tolkien, third son of J.R.R. Tolkien, dies at the age of ninety-five.
23 - Barbara Remington, cover artist on some American editions, dies.
? - Amon Hen 281 is published.

content.title: February
content.content:
7 - Actor Orson Bean dies.
16 - la BnF's exhibition "Tolkien, voyage en Terre du Milieu" closes.

content.title: March
content.content:
14 - Filming for the first season of The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power begins.
25 - Tolkien Reading Day.
? - Amon Hen 282 is published.

content.title: April
content.content:
15 - Sean Arnold, who would play Odo Proudfoot in The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series), dies.
16 - Animator Gene Deitch, director of The Hobbit (1967 film) dies.
23 - Actor Bruce Allpress dies.
30 - The deluxe edition of Sir Gawain and the Green Knight: with Pearl and Sir Orfeo is published.

content.title: May
content.content:
? - Amon Hen 283 is published.
? - Mallorn 60 is published.

content.title: June
content.content:
9 - The Worlds of J.R.R. Tolkien is published.
19 - Ian Holm, actor who played Bilbo Baggins and voiced Frodo Baggins, dies.
25 - A new illustrated edition of The Lord of the Rings is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
4 - The Tolkien Society Seminar is held online due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
19 - Middle-earth, or There and Back Again is published.
? - Amon Hen 284 is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
1 - Tolkien Calendar 2021 is published.
4 - A second edition of The First and Second Ages is published.
18 - 20 - Oxonmoot 2020 held online due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
? - Amon Hen 285 is published.

content.title: October
content.content:
1 - A new illustrated edition of Unfinished Tales is published.
20 - The Lord of the Rings Online: War of Three Peaks is released online.
22 - American author Richard A. Lupoff dies.
29 - The Centenary Edition of Letters from Father Christmas is published.

content.title: November
content.content:
? - Amon Hen 286 is published.
? - Mallorn 61 is published.

content.title: December
content.content:
2 - The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit film series are released in remastered 4k edition on Ultra HD Blu-ray.
15 - The Lambengolmor mailing list is closed down.
Years
2017 2018 2019 2020 2021 2022 2023
